thread.title: Coronation Street viewers spot embarrassing mistake as Aidan visits prison to see Maria
thread.title_full: Coronation Street viewers spot embarrassing mistake as Aidan visits prison to see Maria

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Coronation Street viewers spot embarrassing mistake as Aidan visits prison to see Maria
text:
Coronation Street viewers spot embarrassing mistake as Aidan visits prison to see Maria ITV fans quickly noticed the mishap and rushed to Twitter Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Can you spot it? Corrie set gaffe as Aidan visits Maria in prison Share this video Get soaps   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Coronation Street fans spotted an embarrassing mistake during the latest episode. 
Aidan Connor was visiting Maria in prison, where she was sent on Christmas Eve after being charged over her sham marriage. 
While he waited outside the prison, he received a phone call from Eva, who told her boyfriend that she wouldn't be able to make the visit in time. 
However, it turns out Aidan wasn't even outside the prison after all. Aidan was visiting Maria (Photo: ITV) She's been locked up (Photo: ITV) 
Eagle-eyed viewers noticed that he was actually waiting outside the gates to the set of Coronation Street. 
One smug fan wrote: "There is absolutely no way they have used the location I sit at for 8 hours talking to their security for a scene in Corrie." Read More Coronation Street's Kym Marsh opens up about devastating miscarriage storyline after fans praise her bravery 
"LOVE how Corrie used the studio gates as the prison gates sly," joked another. 
It comes as another Corrie fan noticed a glaring error when Johnny Connor went to Roy's café for his breakfast – and was still there three hours later . Fans noticed a big error (Photo: ITV) 
As Johnny and Jenny Bradley tucked into their cooked breakfast in a recent episode, the clock on the wall read nine o'clock. 
But they were still there – with the same plate of food – three whole hours later, according to the same clock, which now read 12 o'clock. 
"3hrs to eat your breakfast !!!!," Corrie spotter Kevin tweeted. Like us on Facebook
